alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 8:32PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of San Bernardino, Riverside and central Orange Counties through 915 PM PDT... At 832 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norco to Newport Coast. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Brief very heavy rain will also occur. Locations impacted include... Anaheim, Riverside, Irvine, Ontario, Corona, Orange, Mission Viejo, Chino, Tustin, Yorba Linda, San Clemente, Laguna Beach, Dana Point, Newport Beach, Chino Hills, Laguna Niguel, Rancho Santa Margarita, Aliso Viejo, San Juan Capistrano and Norco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
